text:
@BorisJohnson 'Boris Johnson indicates at PMQs he has not read winter coronavirus report'- too busy, eh, to bother with the population's health...after 68,000 deaths already.
Keir Starmer presses PM over scientists’ call for preparations for possible second wave- Johnson hasn't a clue.
